item.title: XRP supply chain attack: Official NPM package infected with crypto stealing backdoor
item.description: The official XPRL (Ripple) NPM package was compromised by sophisticated attackers who put in a backdoor to steal cryptocurrency private keys and gain access to cryptocurrency wallets.

item.title: Introducing the AI Dev Gallery: Your Gateway to Local AI Development with .NET - .NET Blog
item.description: Discover the new AI Dev Gallery, a Windows application that provides interactive local AI samples, easy model downloads, and source code export - all built with .NET AI building blocks.

item.title: How Do We Maintain Code Quality and Technical Debt in Our .NET Codebase?
item.description: Maintaining code quality and managing technical debt is a never-ending journey in any codebase ‚Äî and it‚Äôs no different for us working with .NET. item.title: Microsoft Engineer Scott Seiber on Early AI with Microsoft Bob's Rover and Our AI Future
item.description:
Register for Microsoft Build - https://build.microsoft.com
Scott helped revolutionize how Microsoft software operates on Mac, bridging the Windows-Mac divide long before cross-platform excellence was the norm. He also contributed significantly to Microsoft Bob, a daring initiative designed to bring a human touch to computing by creating an engaging, accessible interface. Join me as we explore the fascinating stories behind these pivotal contributions!
Scott on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/scott-seiber-46088a/
Chapters: 00:00 - Intro 01:05 - Scott's Origin Story 03:00 - Natural Computing with Bob 04:15 - Software Engineer Journey 08:20 - Infusing AI into work and live 09:30 - Why Still at Microsoft & Future Excitement? 11:04 - Wrap-up

item.title: Diving into the .NET World: Beginner's Diary #1
item.description:
Welcome to the Journey!
Hello and welcome! If you're like me ‚Äî someone who relishes in the joy of reading, writing, and sharing knowledge ‚Äî you're in for a treat. In this .NET diary series, I'm excited to share interesting insights from the content I consumed when I was a junior developer.

item.title: A New Form of Verification on Bluesky - Bluesky
item.description: We‚Äôre introducing a new layer of verification ‚Äî a user-friendly, easily recognizable blue check. Additionally, independent organizations can verify accounts directly through our Trusted Verifiers feature.
